I would explore the city from a bird's eye view, taking in the sights and sounds of the world below.
I would fly over the ocean, feeling the wind in my feathers and the thrill of the vast expanse of water beneath me.
I would take aerial photographs of the landscape, capturing the beauty of the world from a unique perspective.
I would soar through the sky, feeling the rush of adrenaline and the freedom of flight.
I would fly to different parts of the world, experiencing new cultures and exploring new places.
